<karlfloersch> > <karlfloersch>  There are two primary approaches: 1) store the current KZG commitment in EVM state when posting your blobs; or 2) evaluate the KZG commitments in the fault proof itself, using the preimage oracle to load relevant block & blob data for your challenge. This 2nd approach doesn’t require the opcode (re @ralexstokes: i have one more question: how are rollups expected to retrieve kzgs for prior blob transactions?
